alert.note: Alert for Billings; Golden Valley (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 3:41AM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, ground blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, life threatening cold. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Golden Valley and Billings counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 5 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, making travel dangerous. The life threatening cold will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Avoid outside activities if possible. Do not use generators or grills inside.
